name: pnp-powerautomate-samples-Power-Platform-Blog-Update-Flow
title: Power Platform Blog Update Flow
shortDescription: Two flows that users can configure to run daily and weekly keeping them up to date with the latest Power Platform blog posts.
longDescription: Having multiple RSS flows per Power Platform product can get messy. More over, it's not always user friendly accessing these updates through the Power Automate notifications. These two flows, a weekly and daily flow, retrieve all Power Platform product blog updates and summarize them into product categories through a neat HTML template. Then once a week/day, users can receive a summary of all blog updates via email with links to each individual blog post.
